QueryToExecute:
select
  name as resource,
  case
    when encryption_option is not null then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when encryption_option is not null then name || ' encryption at rest enabled.'
    else name || ' encryption at rest disabled.'
  end as reason
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_athena_workgroup;
